about.title: About Us
about.who_text: ColiPop is a bakery producing coliva, desserts and cakes. We combine tradition with innovation to offer quality products for memorials, events and everyday occasions.
about.vision_text: To be a reference in the practical preparation of young people for the business world, through bakery activity and coliva products.
about.mission_text: We deliver quality bakery and coliva products while developing real business skills.
about.partners_text: We work with schools and practice company networks to deliver best practices.
about.standards_text: We follow good practices and, where applicable, ISO standards and national practice company networks.
about.colipop_intro: COLIPOP is the perfect fusion of tradition and innovation, turning coliva into a modern and surprising dessert.
about.mission_full: SC COLIPOP S.R.L. aims to revolutionise the concept of coliva, offering reinterpreted variants of this traditional product.
about.market_trends: The market for traditional products is growing. Consumers appreciate authentic recipes and natural ingredients.
about.growth_potential: Service diversification, expansion through partnerships and digitalisation.
about.client_needs: Authentic taste and freshness; customisation; fast delivery; competitive pricing.
about.sales_strategy: Promotion via social networks; online orders; samples for loyalty; promotional packages.
about.competition: Personalised services, fast delivery. ColiPop combines innovation with tradition.
about.services_intro: Coliva customisation; event delivery; modern brand; personalised individual cups.
about.objectives: Growing demand for traditional products; partnerships with institutions; menu diversification.
about.financial: Equipment and resources from own funds: food truck, kitchen equipment, refrigerator, furniture, POS system.

legal.terms_intro: Welcome to the ColiPop website. Please read the terms and conditions below carefully. Accessing and using this site implies explicit acceptance of these conditions.

terms_sections.title: 1. General Definitions
terms_sections.content: The website colipop.ro is administered by SC COLIPOP S.R.L. Terms such as 'Seller', 'We', 'The Company' refer to SC COLIPOP S.R.L. The term 'Client' or 'User' refers to any natural or legal person who accesses the site or places an order.

terms_sections.title: 2. Products and Services
terms_sections.content: ColiPop is a practice firm (simulation) operating for educational purposes, but also a real bakery according to the activity description. The products presented (coliva, cakes, pastry products) are made according to current regulations. Product images are for presentation purposes and minor differences may exist compared to the final product.

terms_sections.title: 3. Orders and Prices
terms_sections.content: Displayed prices are in RON and include VAT according to legislation. We reserve the right to modify prices without prior notice, but the confirmed price on a placed order will not be changed. Orders can be placed by phone or via the contact form, to be confirmed by an operator.

terms_sections.title: 4. Delivery and Payment
terms_sections.content: Delivery is made to the mutually agreed location, within Braila city and surrounding areas. Payment can be made in cash upon delivery or by bank transfer, based on the issued fiscal invoice.

terms_sections.title: 5. Right of Return
terms_sections.content: According to OUG 34/2014, food products that are liable to deteriorate or expire rapidly are exempted from the right of withdrawal. However, if products are qualitatively non-compliant at the time of delivery, we assume responsibility for replacing them or refunding the value.

terms_sections.title: 6. Intellectual Property
terms_sections.content: The entire content of the site (texts, images, logos) is the property of SC COLIPOP S.R.L. and is protected by Copyright Law. Use of any elements without the company's written consent is punishable according to laws in force.

terms_sections.title: 7. Disputes
terms_sections.content: Any dispute arising between Client and Seller will be resolved amicably. If the conflict cannot be resolved amicably, competence lies with the Romanian courts.

legal.privacy_intro: The confidentiality of your data is important to us. This policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and what your rights are.

privacy_sections.title: 1. What Data We Collect
privacy_sections.content: We collect data that you provide directly, such as: Name and Surname, Email Address, Phone Number (in contact form). We also collect automatic technical data via cookies (IP address, browser type).

privacy_sections.title: 2. Purpose of Collection
privacy_sections.content:
Data is used for:
• Receiving and processing offer requests.
• Communicating with clients regarding order status.
• Improving the site experience.
• Complying with legal obligations (e.g., invoicing).

privacy_sections.title: 3. Legal Basis
privacy_sections.content: Data processing is done based on your consent (by completing the form) or for the execution of a contract (processing an order).

privacy_sections.title: 4. Data Disclosure
privacy_sections.content: We do not sell or rent your personal data. We may transmit data to public authorities if required by law or to strictly necessary service providers (e.g., accounting services, couriers).

privacy_sections.title: 5. Your Rights
privacy_sections.content: According to GDPR Regulation, you have the right to request access to data, rectification, deletion thereof ('right to be forgotten'), or restriction of processing. To exercise these rights, you can contact us at the mentioned email address.

legal.cookies_intro: Our website uses cookies to offer a better browsing experience and services adapted to user needs.

cookies_sections.title: 1. What is a 'cookie'?
cookies_sections.content: A cookie is a small text file stored on your computer or mobile device when you visit the site. It allows the site to 'remember' your actions and preferences for a period of time.

cookies_sections.title: 2. How do we use cookies?
cookies_sections.content:
We use cookies for:
• Necessary site functioning (session maintenance).
• Traffic analysis (via anonymized tools) to understand how visitors interact with the site.

cookies_sections.title: 3. Types of cookies used
cookies_sections.content:
• Strictly necessary cookies: Essential for navigation.
• Analysis cookies: Help us improve site structure.

cookies_sections.title: 4. How can cookies be controlled?
cookies_sections.content: You can block or delete cookies from your browser settings. Please note that disabling certain cookies may affect site functionality.
